comment: She was strict about deadlines (at 11am which is weird but ok) but we all knew well in advance what was due and when. Enjoyed that we could do most of our work for the class well in advance, besides the group project and tests. My only complaint: she sends these alarming announcements constantly that would make us all worry for no reason. Good prof

Took her for MGT3100 - Super easy. Lots of discussions and quizzes. Be prepared for a group project where your team members are assigned. If you put in the work, it is incredibly simple to earn an A. NO late work accepted. Offers extra credit at the end of the semester. Great communication/replies to questions and emails quickly. Would take again.
VERY easy class!! Took online and she always gives A's. Just make sure you turn stuff in on time. Very easy tests, gives lots of extra credit opportunities. 10/10 recommend.

By far the easiest A I received in college. Yes, there is a lot of work, but she grades fairly easy. Do the work and you will be fine. I never read, but used the book on test and quizzes and made A's on them. She does not accept late work at all, but she gives you extra credit and it is easy. TAKE HER ONLINE!

The class was boring, but nothing we did in class required much work at all. I took the hybrid class so we only met once a week, a few assignments are turned in, in class, everything else was turned in online, easy A. Lots of time for assignments. The only thing is she does not accept late work at all.

Prof Brookshire is very nice. Online assignments/Tests make up your grade. Online assignments are easy though. Class is pretty boring though. Science is not my best subject and I made a high B in the class, an A is very possible though.
She is very good. This class is useless though required.
extremely easy class. took online. do the work she is an easy grader. Got an A out the class.
Great class; didn't expect to learn much, but actually learned quite a bit. She's a great teacher and extremely responsive. Would absolutely take another class with her if I have the chance.
Easy intro-to-college class I took online. Very easy A, just do the work.

This is the KSU Freshman Seminar class that is required. I took it online. I personally did not like it. It was my 1st online class so that could be why. All the assignments were pretty easy the tests came straight from the book and there was a paper but she pretty much outlined it for you and told you exactly what she wanted.

I took her my 1st semester, in summer 2009. She was very helpful and knew what she taught. I had her 1st thing in the morning (8am) and she was very cheerful and fun. Offered extra help if needed and did plenty of in class examples.
